subject: Cycling, Road
Tour de France (Bicycle Race)
lead_paragraph: Greipel, a German, won Thursday’s 120-mile stage, beating, among others, Marcel Kittel, who had won three previous sprint stages. Vincenzo Nibali remained the leader.
snippet: Greipel, a German, won Thursday’s 120-mile stage, beating, among others, Marcel Kittel, who had won three previous sprint stages. Vincenzo Nibali remained the leader.
